hero.description: a Strategic Designer & Executive Leader with 7+ years leading design teams across B2B platforms, fintech, and global marketplaces. Building high-performing teams and scaling design frameworks that drive measurable business impact across 32 countries.

case3tpm.title: 3TPM - Global Product Architecture
case3tpm.description: Led the design and implementation of a comprehensive product architecture framework across 32 countries, resulting in 150% growth in experimentation.

howILead.title: How I lead
howILead.subtitle: My approach to building design teams that deliver.

crossFunctional.title: Cross-functional influence
crossFunctional.description: Building bridges between design, engineering, product and business teams to create aligned, high-impact solutions.

balanced.title: Balanced strategy
balanced.description: Combining user-centered design thinking with business objectives to deliver solutions that are both meaningful and measurable

inclusive.title: Inclusive leadership
inclusive.description: Fostering diverse, inclusive environments where every voice is heard and every perspective adds value to the creative process.

problemFraming.title: Problem framing
problemFraming.description: Approaching complex challenges with systematic thinking, clear problem definition, and data-driven decision making.

howILead.quote: Great design leadership isn't about having all the answers, it's about asking the right questions, creating the right environment, and empowering teams to discover solutions together.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: With 15+ years in design and 7+ in leadership, I've scaled design impact across 32 countries, building distributed teams that deliver measurable business outcomes. I specialize in creating inclusive, high-performing design organizations that bridge user needs with business objectives.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines strategic thinking with hands-on leadership, developing frameworks and processes that enable teams to work effectively across cultures and time zones. This includes career frameworks, quality assurance processes, and experimentation methodologies that scale globally.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: A journey of building design organizations, scaling impact, and leading teams across global markets.

stealth.description: Defined UX vision and product narrative for AI solutions in a regulated sector, balancing innovation, governance, and user clarity.

abinbev.description: Own the strategic UX for BEES, a global B2B commerce platform operating in 30+ countries.

vindi.description: Managed DesignOps, Product Designers, and UX Research for fintech platform.

zup.description: Led UX strategy for telecom and finance products, directing redesigns and unified visions.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Let's build something amazing together. I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and collaborations.
